name: Weiler's Construction Service
tagline: If you can imagine it, we can build it.
body:
### Weiler's Construction Services
We're a family run business specializing in insulated concrete forms, framing, interior and exterior finishing work.
We have a combined experience of 80 years working together in this industry.

## Who is who?
* Peter Weiler - Owner/Operator
* Paul Weiler - Foreman/Second in command
* Lee Jones - Carpenter helper

## Part time workers
* Dale Weiler - Book keeping and on-site help
* Norm Way - on-site help
* Parry Way - on-site help

## Licenses and qualifications
* Basics of elevated work platform - Peter Weiler & Paul Weiler
* Aerial Equipment - Peter Weiler & Paul Weiler
* Scaffold Safety - Peter Weiler & Paul Weiler
* Personnel Lifts (Goodfellow Construction Inc.) - Peter Weiler & Paul Weiler
* Rough Terrain Scissor Lifts (Goodfellow Construction Inc.) - Peter Weiler & Paul Weiler
* Basics of Fall Protection - Peter Weiler
* Nudura Trained Installer - Peter Weiler & Paul Weiler & Lee Jones
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
